price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߒ߬ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߟߊ߫ ߤߌߣߊ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߟߊ߬ߜߍ ߝߣߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ، ߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߞߏߌ߫
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
